pr_title: Fix RemoveOrphanFilesAction when file_path is not a qualified path

timeline.message: Fix RemoveOrphanFilesAction when file_path is not a qualified path

timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Ok, I see. If the file name is unique, then I think it would be fine to change to this way. Let me update the code.
replies.author: jerryshao

replies.bodyText: Even if it isn't unique, we don't expect many duplicates because writers will be operating in parallel. And the worst case is all files have the same name and all get joined in a task -- which is pretty much the same as using a nested loop join.
replies.author: rdblue
